author: ivan
msg: Change of convention for multiline string literal. No semantics changes.
() Replace APR_EOL_STR with NL macro in string literals. Move it to line with
text and align NL macro to end on the 79th column.

author: malcolm
msg: * STATUS: Temporarily veto r24483, until someone can fix the test.

author: ivan
msg: Stop building APR, APR-util and APR-iconv automatically on Windows.
- We don't build most of external libraries now (bdb, openssl, sqlite)
- We generate only VC6 project files for these libraries, so building of APR
automatically useless with VS.NET for present time.
- It makes our build system easier.
(apr, aprutil, apriconv, xml): Stop building of these libraries.
we don't need build these dependencies.
functions to find APR and APR-util major version.
WinGeneratorBase.get_win_lib_dirs): Add APR, APR-util and XML libraries to

author: vgeorgescu
msg: (enable_sasl): New variable. Set it to 1 if '--enable-sasl' was used. Use it

author: vgeorgescu
msg: (_usage_exit): Align the --list option with the others.
